argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | gsumsubgcl.z | |- .0. = ( 0g ` G ) |
| 2 |  | gsumsubgcl.g | |- ( ph -> G e. Abel ) |
| 3 |  | gsumsubgcl.a | |- ( ph -> A e. V ) |
| 4 |  | gsumsubgcl.s | |- ( ph -> S e. ( SubGrp ` G ) ) |
| 5 |  | gsumsubgcl.f | |- ( ph -> F : A --> S ) |
| 6 |  | gsumsubgcl.w | |- ( ph -> F finSupp .0. ) |
| 7 |  | #P_ablcmn | |- ( G e. Abel -> G e. CMnd ) |
| 8 | 2, 7 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> G e. CMnd ) |
| 9 |  | #P_subgsubm | |- ( S e. ( SubGrp ` G ) -> S e. ( SubMnd ` G ) ) |
| 10 | 4, 9 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> S e. ( SubMnd ` G ) ) |
| 11 | 1, 8, 3, 10, 5, 6 | #P_gsumsubmcl | |- ( ph -> ( G gsum F ) e. S ) |
